channel.title: About on Chenfei
channel.description: Recent content in About on Chenfei

item.title: Research
item.description: My research interests lie in empirical asset pricing and market microstructure. In particular, I examine the trading behaviour of different market participants and how this will affect market dynamics, including price and liquidity. My current projects focus on market makers in the ETF market. Working papers Liquidity provision in the Exchange Traded Fund market, with Carole Comerton-Forde, and Zhuo Zhong [Paper] ETF Designed Market Makers (DMMs) retreat from liquidity provision when the intraday deviation between ETF market prices and indicative net asset values (intraday tracking error) increases.
